content.question: The third paragraph provides

choices.label: a series of assertions about the nature of language
a rationale for the author's shifting allegiances
an anecdote that reinforces ideas expressed in the previous paragraphs
an argument that will be challenged in the remainder of the passage

content.answer: an anecdote that reinforces ideas expressed in the previous paragraphs

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
